question: Question_02_(e)
sols:
The function is decreasing between $(-\sqrt{3},\sqrt{3})$ by part (a)
and so this eliminates graphs a,b,c,d,f,h,i,j,k,l.

This leaves only e and g. The slant asymptote on g is incorrect and
hence this leave the correct answer e.
hints:
Use the information from the previous parts to help pick the correct
picture. In particular, try to use parts a and d.
